Header: An insurance scheme for local craftsmen
Content: Deputy Minister Buddhika Pathirana says that an insurance scheme for local craftsmen will be introduced this year. The Deputy Minister mentioned this while attending the ceremony to open the Palmyrah products village at Vavuniya, Thandikulama area. A large number of women will get employment through the village. The village has been built with an investment of five million rupees from the National Crafts Council.
